scripts.build: npx @11ty/eleventy && npm run minify:html && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:css: npx purifycss dist/assets/css/bootstrap.css dist/assets/css/fork-awesome.css dist/assets/css/style.css  dist/**/*.html dist/*.html -w .collapsing .collapse .fade .dropdown-menu.show .carousel-indicators .carousel-fade .carousel-item-next .carousel-item-prev  .active.carousel-item-end .active.carousel-item-start --min --info --out dist/assets/css/all.min.css
scripts.minify:html: mv dist/assets assets && npx html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true  --input-dir dist --output-dir dist && mv assets dist/assets
